verses.name: Genesis 34:12
verses.text: Ask me never so much dowry and gift, and I will give according as ye shall say unto me: but give me the damsel to wife.

verses.name: Genesis 34:13
verses.text: And the sons of Jacob answered Shechem and Hamor his father deceitfully, and said, because he had defiled Dinah their sister:

verses.name: Genesis 34:14
verses.text: And they said unto them, We cannot do this thing, to give our sister to one that is uncircumcised; for that were a reproach unto us:

verses.name: Genesis 34:15
verses.text: But in this will we consent unto you: If ye will be as we be, that every male of you be circumcised;
